backend/AltSignup.mo: Provides a simple signup handler that validates non‑empty credentials and returns a simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor implementing RBAC, user profile storage, onboarding flow management, and an alternate signup entrypoint.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration types for actor state and currently returns the state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata describing removal of the temporary SignupTest button from the landing page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists pre‑generated summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, config, and components.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts, sets II_URL environment config, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Declares allowed alternative origins for Internet Identity.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects all unknown routes to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with the root layout and all application routes including /signup-test.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared Internet Identity configuration for AuthClient creation and login options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug panel showing detailed authentication state, timing, platform info, and stall detection used when debugAuth=1.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Reusable error display with a message and optional Retry and Return-to-Landing actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Help panel explaining blocked popup issues and giving retry and direct II link options.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Status banner showing current auth step, timing, outcomes, and suggested retry or II link actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Banner indicating backend warmup, success, or failure with retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handles II #authorize callback, checks onboarding status, and routes to onboarding or main app.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Loads II config then wraps children in a configured InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps the app in onboarding context and handles II authorization callbacks before rendering child routes.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Modal component for task execution with a countdown timer, pause/resume controls, and completion handling.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config returning empty values and warning to use aiProxyClient instead.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context managing onboarding results with localStorage hydration, persistence, and clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Hook managing auth attempt lifecycle including timestamps, correlation IDs, and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks auth flow state, timing, step transitions, and slow-step detection with logging utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Manages asynchronous canister warmup with timeout handling, retries, and state guards to prevent concurrent calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, managing AuthClient initialization, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Mobile-friendly Internet Identity login hook that pre-initializes AuthClient and returns structured login outcomes.
Variant of the mobile login hook using shared II config for AuthClient initialization and login options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Implements a provider and hook for username/password-based identities with storage-backed persistence and lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: React hook that manages timeout tracking for post-auth phases, exposing timeout state, elapsed time, and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalled authentication steps by tracking elapsed time and applying step-specific timeouts to flag slow or stuck login flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme tokens, typography, and utility layers for the app.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Deprecated AI client that throws an error if used, directing callers to the proxy-based client.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: AI proxy client with request/response types and validation helpers, plus custom error handling for external AI API calls.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides storage key and safe JSON parse/stringify helpers for persisting onboarding results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint that mounts React, sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Daily tasks page that loads AI‑generated tasks based on onboarding data, handles loading/error states, and displays task details.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: UI page showing hardcoded chocolate inventory across time periods with toggleable views and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature carousel modal, and navigation buttons for signup and login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Complex Internet Identity login flow with diagnostics, timeout handling, actor initialization, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Multi‑step onboarding form that validates access, collects goal data, calls an AI plan generator, and manages a summary carousel.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Signup page implementing Internet Identity authentication with stateful flow control, diagnostics, and warmup handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Lightweight alternate signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding on success.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the AI‑generated onboarding plan with goal, weekly mountain, and navigation back to onboarding if missing data.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Fetches or restores the weekly mountain plan based on onboarding data, storing results in localStorage and handling loading, errors, and backend onboarding checks.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides utilities for correlated auth logging, step timing, readable labels, and diagnostics for slow or failed authentication flows.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities by checking anonymity and delegation validity, and determines whether a session is stale.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and manages storing, restoring, and clearing them in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects platform details, especially whether the browser is Chrome on Android, with cached lookup utilities.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Safely converts AI-provided values into strings for rendering and offers helpers for validating and extracting string fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query strings and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, colors, typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s schema version, feature list, and a detailed description of the dapp’s architecture across Motoko backend, React frontend, authentication, onboarding, RBAC, and AI-integration. Serves as a centralized snapshot of implemented features and their versions for build planning.
